name: angular-tree
description: This extension scans your Angular project, analyzes component templates and imports, and renders an interactive hierarchy tree showing parent-child relationships. Click any node to jump to its source. Supports Angular standalone components, template selectors, and dynamic refresh on save.

commands.title: Angular Tree: Show Angular Hierarchy Tree

scripts.compile: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js
scripts.package: npm run check-types && npm run lint && node esbuild.js --production
scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
